body:
I just want to let you know about the stats that the servers are on. this is based of every week & will be updated every few weeks
                                                           Avicus Stats v.1.8

Nebula:   Average: 32/100                                     
Nexus: Average: 8/50
Walls: Average: 12/40
Avicade: Offline
CTH Average: 0/64
Elimination: Average: 3/64
                             
                                      The Most Players on the Game will the the tag
THESE STATS are Updated regularly  

CHANGE LOG:

- Updated Order
- Updated 4/9/2014 (Changed Nebula & Nexus)
- Next Update: 10/9/14
- Updated (Changed to Average no point for minimum)
